sdata.e: In such cases, adults should not scold them instantly, but be patient with them, considering their mental growth.

sdata.j: お↑守↑↓|まも↓り|はあなたよ。
sdata.e: You're my good omen.

sdata.e: This book is my good luck charm; I read it every five months.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑仲良↑↓なかよ↓しだ。↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑必↑↓かなら↓ず↑約束↑↓やくそく↓を↑守↑↓|まも↓り|、↑誰↑↓だれ↓からも↑信用↑↓しんよう↓されている。
sdata.e: I am on good terms with him. He always keeps his promises and is relied upon by everybody.

sdata.j: ↑神↑↓かみ↓よわれわれを↑守↑↓|まも↓り|たまえ！
sdata.e: God preserve us!

sdata.j: ↑約束↑↓やくそく↓は↑守↑↓|まも↓り|なさい。
